text: Nattu Vishesham is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Paul Njarakkel, starring Mukesh and Siddique in the lead roles.http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Nattu-Vishesham-1991/9465401022 ==Cast== * Mukesh as William Fredrick/Kochuthewar/Vinod Kumar * Siddique as James Manchester/ Aniyankunju * Janardhanan as Mooppan * Vijayaraghavan as Vijay *Pujappura Ravi *Jagannadha Varma as Madhava Menon *Prathapachandran as Mathew *V K Sreeraman as Rajan * Boby Kottarakkara ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Nattu Vishesham
